item.title: 3D Tile System in Godot
item.description: This is a short article to bring some insight into how we implemented a simple 3D tile system in Godot. The code is in C#. Enjoy! Overview Your browser does not support the video tag. In essence, the entire map is just a 3D array where each cell maps to an abstract Tile class: Tile[,,] Tiles; // [column, row, floor] The abstract Tile class defines the common data and behaviour that all tiles in the game should have.
